title: Chen Xiyu
text: Chen Xiyu () (July 1911 – July 2000) was the 4th governor of the <a href="People%27s%20Bank%20of%20China">People's Bank of China</a> (1973–1978). He was born in <a href="Huozhou">Huozhou</a>, <a href="Linfen">Linfen</a>, <a href="Shanxi">Shanxi</a> Province. He joined the <a href="Communist%20Party%20of%20China">Communist Party of China</a> in 1936.
